Package weather

Class Point

java.lang.Object
weather.GeoJson
weather.Point
public class Point extends GeoJson
Wraps the NWS API Point object.
Author:
cobalt

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Point(double latitude, double longitude)
    Returns a point object from the NWS API with the given latitude and longitude.
    Point(com.github.cliftonlabs.json_simple.JsonObject jsonObj)
    Wraps a NWS Point JSON in the Point object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    bearingFromCity()
    Returns the directional bearing toward the city given by city() in compass degrees.
    String
    city()
    Returns the city and state nearest to the point.
    String
    county()
    Returns the NWS county code of the point.
    double
    distanceFromCity()
    Returns the distance in meters from the city given by city().
    String
    fireZone()
    Returns the fire weather forecast zone of the point.
    int
    gridX()
    Returns the point's X position on the WFO's forecast grid.
    int
    gridY()
    Returns the point's Y position on the WFO's forecast grid.
    double
    latitude()
    Returns the latitude of the point
    double
    longitude()
    Returns the longitude of the point
    Office
    office()
    Returns the WFO associated with the point.
    String
    radar()
    Returns the radar station responsible for this point
    String
    timeZone()
    Returns the timezone of the point.
    String
    zone()
    Returns the forecast zone of the point.
